QuestData.Title: The Heart of the Matter
QuestData.Description: Well, $gladdie:little lady;, half of me wishes I could stick around a while and take in the sights with ye.$b$bI've seen some mighty amazin' things in my day, but this here takes the cake.$b$bSadly, I have a fair bit o' research ta do on these discs before I make my way into the Halls of Origination.$b$bYou seem ta be worth your salt, perhaps ye'd like ta tag along and see how a REAL archaeologist works, eh?
QuestData.LogDescription: Brann Bronzebeard wants you to meet him in the Halls of Origination.
QuestData.RewardText: Bout time ye showed up, $glad:lass;.$b$bNow let's get goin'! There be work ta do!
